room_title: Escape room "The Sherlock Adventure" by Escapade 360 in Chicago
review: So much fun! We did the Sherlock room - the puzzles were great, and just the right amount of challenge. Would definitely recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Sherlock Adventure" by Escapade 360 in Chicago
review: We had a great time completing the Sherlock Adventure. An amazing amount of detail was put into the room and it was well thought out. The puzzles were an appropriate level of difficulty - definitely made you think, but not impossible. We did this as part of a birthday celebration, and there were balloons hidden in the room with an extra clue. Keisha is awesome! Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Sherlock Adventure" by Escapade 360 in Chicago
review: Impressive details and surprises, and the owners are so great! The Sherlock Holmes room was such a fun experience and we can't wait to do more!
